msbt.message: Been into any cool fitness training programs lately, ?
Yep.
Nope.
I'll look into some.
Oh yeah? Good for you!It feels good to work out, so let's both keep it up, !
I see I guess you have more, uh, sit-down hobbies, .Well, maybe we can get together for some sometime. You'd have fun!
Oh, nice! I'll be cheering you on then, !
So an old buddy of mine has invited me to play a sport with him. Any sport at all, .These are the kinds of requests you get when you're at my level. So what sport do you think we oughta play?
Tennis. Basketball. Soccer.
Wrestling. Boxing. Judo.
Bungee Jumping.
Yep, I could do some stretches, work on a few skills, and have a lot of fun, even if the competition gets fierce. Alright! Time for some ball-control drills, !
Yep, I could do some stretches, work on a few skills, and have a lot of fun, even if the competition gets fierce. Alright! Time to learn all the rules, !
Butthat's a solo sport. Where's the competition in that?
Hey! I've got a totally built question for you—which muscles would you rather work on, ?
My biceps.
My triceps.
My quads.
My delts.
That choice says a lot about you, .The bent-arm biceps pose is a classic symbol of strength.I bet you're a traditionalist who is ready to put the work into making progress.

That choice says a lot about you, .The bulgy biceps tend to get the glory, but you choose the triceps— important and supportive muscles. I bet you're a faithful friend who doesn't mind showing support from the sidelines.

That choice says a lot about you, .The thigh muscles are important for extending your legs, running, and even just standing up. If I had to guess, I'd say you're really good at fundamentals like kindness and honesty.

That choice says a lot about you, .Shoulder muscles help with throwing and swinging and, most importantly, lifting stuff. I bet you're the type who likes to lift up friends and inspire them to greatness.
Yo! I've got a vigorous question for you—which sport would you rather play with your buddies?
Soccer.
Baseball.
Marathon.
Basketball.
That really says a lot about you, .In soccer, strong teamwork and play execution are really important.I bet your friends think of you as "the reliable one."
That really says a lot about you, .Baseball requires both athletic skill and a deep understanding of the game's complex strategies. I bet your friends think of you as "the serious one."

That really says a lot about you, .Running a marathon is no joke. Your success depends as much on your mental state as your physical state. If I had to guess, your friends think of you as "the ambitious one."
That really says a lot about you, .In basketball, you definitely need your team, but you can also rise to the top as a superstar. If I had to guess, your friends think of you as "the hotshot."
Got any maxims on haircuts you feel strongly about, ?
Yep!
Not really.
It's a secret.
I knew it! I just had a gut feeling.I usually style my hair so that I can run faster!Never know when you're gonna need some extra aerodynamics to kick in, .

Oh yeah? I figured you'd have a reason for it, .I often style my hair so it cuts down on the drag when I swim. I wanna be like a torpedo zipping past everyone. Of course, I don't really like to dunk my head underwater, and I usually swim with a floaty device on
What?! If it's a secret, then I'm more curious than ever, !
